meta.name: Kimora: Back in the Fab Lane
meta.description: This fierce fashionista – now a single mom of five – commands an empire while running her iconic Baby Phat brand and juggling a billion-dollar business portfolio. Between dealing with the whims of her top-model daughters, cheering at her sons' championship games and celebrating her own major milestones, Kimora's world is even more fabulous and outrageous than ever before. Buckle up.

videos.title: Babies on the Brain
videos.overview: Ming's visit to the OB-GYN raises concerns about her fertility. Meanwhile, Kimora celebrates her Asian heritage with her daughters by her side.

videos.title: Ming Lee Has a Job!
videos.overview: Kimora encourages her daughters to pursue their passions beyond modeling. While Ming plans the launch of her body care line, Aoki starts to lay the groundwork for her return to Bali.

videos.title: Their Inheritance Is on the Line
videos.overview: Aoki works on a business idea in the hope of impressing her mother. Meanwhile, Kimora pushes Ming to go back to school, and Kenzo wants to break into modeling.

videos.title: Birthdays & Birkins & Bali
videos.overview: The family gathers to celebrate Kimora's 50th birthday and prepares to say goodbye to Aoki.

videos.title: The Prodigal Daughter Returns
videos.overview: Kimora is thrilled that Aoki has come home, but her youngest daughter's return causes friction with her siblings.

videos.title: Baby Phat or Bust
videos.overview: Kimora tasks Ming and Aoki with planning the next Baby Phat photoshoot, forcing the sisters to set aside their differences and work together.
